Source.Name: grilo
Source.Description:
Grilo is a framework focused on making media discovery and browsing easy for application developers.
More precisely, Grilo provides:
A single, high-level API that abstracts the differences among various media content providers, allowing application developers to integrate content from various services and sources easily. A collection of plugins for accessing content from various media providers. Developers can share efforts and code by writing plugins for the framework that are application agnostic. A flexible API that allows plugin developers to write plugins of various kinds.
